pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debian-软件源","children":"Debian 软件源"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/debian/","children":"Debian 帮助"}]," 修改 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"软件源","children":"软件源"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pve-no-subscription.list"}],"（如果选择的不是 pve，需要使用另一个文件名），内容为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pve-no-subscription.list","menus":[{"title":"Debian 版本","items":[["Debian 13",{"release_name":"trixie"}],["Debian 12",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"release_name":"bullseye"}]]},{"title":"服务","items":[["Proxmox Virtual Environment (PVE)",{"service":"pve"}],["Proxmox Backup Server (PBS)",{"service":"pbs"}],["Proxmox Backup Client (PBS-CLIENT)",{"service":"pbs-client"}],["Proxmox Mail Gateway (PMG)",{"service":"pmg"}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/debian/{{service}} {{release_name}} {{service}}-no-subscription","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"注意快速配置中的文件名需要根据需求而修改。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"iso-安装文件下载","children":"ISO 安装文件下载"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/iso/"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"ct-templates","children":"CT Templates"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你需要加速 Proxmox 网页端下载 CT Templates，可以替换 CT Templates 的源。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["具体方法：将 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/usr/share/perl5/PVE/APLInfo.pm"}]," 文件中默认的源地址 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"http://download.proxmox.com"}],"
替换为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"可以使用如下命令修改："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"cp /usr/share/perl5/PVE/APLInfo.pm /usr/share/perl5/PVE/APLInfo.pm_back
sed -i 's|http://download.proxmox.com|{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}|g' /usr/share/perl5/PVE/APLInfo.pm","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["针对 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/usr/share/perl5/PVE/APLInfo.pm"}]," 文件的修改，重启后生效。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"openmediavault","children":"OpenMediaVault"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["本节供 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/OpenMediaVault/","children":"OpenMediaVault 帮助"}],"使用。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"omv-env set OMV_PROXMOX_APT_REPOSITORY_URL "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/debian"","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Proxmox 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
